subject: Coaches and Managers
Soccer
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mazzei helped persuade Pelé to play in the United States and coached the New York Cosmos to a North American Soccer League title in 1982.
snippet: Mr. Mazzei helped persuade Pelé to play in the United States and coached the New York Cosmos to a North American Soccer League title in 1982.
